body:
I am :-1: on this as I don't think we should generate that much code into a user application. I can't honestly remember the last time I ran into an inflection exception and that is easy enough to fix, it doesn't justify all that noise in new apps.

A possible more elegant solution to the problem is to version inflections and we could keep it in the framework as times passes. The application would simply choose a version. Hopefully, changes will be rare and we won't introduce many new versions since the goal is **not** to have a complete set of inflections with all special cases.

Let's discuss more about the subject as we go.
